comment: Obsolete version of ~ abbii as of 7-May-2023. (Contributed by NM, 26-May-1993.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-10 , ~ ax-11 , and ~ ax-12 . (Revised by Steven Nguyen, 3-May-2023.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
